name: The LookBack LookBook
description:
Final Project by Michelle Kim

Mediated Narrative Spring 2022

Carnegie Mellon University


A lookbook that looks back in time.

From casual looks to streetwear to formal outfits, each memorable era shows its different personality and attitude.

Discover the fashion icons from the 1970s to the present.

Learn how fashion has evolved through history.

Gain inspiration in and appreciation for certain styles of clothing.
